hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #Epona's Song#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple GS Boss Key Loop

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Desert Colossus# sands echo with #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Water Temple# is on the way of the hero.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #Zora's River#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path to the #Forest Medallion#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that plundering #Kakariko Village# is a foolish choice.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##Kakariko Village## has #0# major items.

HC (Malon).text: They say that Zelda's Lullaby can be used to repair broken signs.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Ganon's trials# protect the way to #Barinade#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that Sheik waits in the #Death Mountain Crater# to teach #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #4# major items.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Bottom of the Well# is a foolish choice.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to the #Shadow Medallion#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 5 Bottom

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Skull Mask# can be found in #the Market#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to #Dampé's Grave#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Invisible Enemies Chest

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Water Temple# is on the path to the #Spirit Medallion#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Magic Beans#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that in the #Sacred Forest Meadow#, Sheik teaches #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Magic Beans#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #a Forest Temple Small Key# can be found at #Zora's River#.

SFM (Saria).text: Did you know that Gorons understood SRM long before speedrunners did?

ToT (Left).text: They say that #a Red Rupee# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Field# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Ice Cavern# corridors ring with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides a #Bow Shooting Gallery#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that most of the water in Hyrule flows through King Zora's buttocks.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path to the #Water Medallion#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Crater## has #1# major item.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals an #Octorok# guarding a rich pool.
